name: Hrygoriy Skovoroda
generalDescription: The coin is dedicated to Hryhoriy Skovoroda, a great Ukrainian philosopher and scientist of the 18th century. (1722-1794)
averseDescription: On the coin obverse there is the small State Emblem of Ukraine in the middle of the beads circumference decoration, framed with guelder-rose sprays. Above the State Emblem there is the year of issue -1996. Around the coin circumference there are inscriptions: УКРАЇНА - above and 1 МІЛЬЙОН КАРБОВАНЦІВ - underneath in three lines. Left and right from figure 1 there are designations of Аg 925 and 15,55, coin`s pure weight.
reverseDescription: On the coin reverse there is a portrait of the outstanding Ukrainian philosopher and educator of the 18th century Hrygoriy Skovoroda. The imprint of Skovoroda`s personal seal is to the portrait`s left. Around the coin circumference there are inscriptions ГРИГОРІЙ СКОВОРОДА - to the left and 1722-1794 - years of Skovoroda`s birth and death - to the right.
